h2_title: Buddha's Right Hand Boss Fight and Guide
content: Once you have finally depleted its health, it will try to flee the tunnel and fly away, only to be shot down violently -- forming a bridge with its "hand". Your mysterious lady friend will return to urge you onward before she disappears.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Buddha's_Right_Hand.md', within the main section titled 'Buddha's Right Hand', specifically from the subsection 'Buddha's Right Hand Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Once you have finally depleted its health, it will try to flee the tunnel and fly away, only to be shot down violently -- forming a bridge with its "hand". Your mysterious lady friend will return to urge you onward before she disappears.
